job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to enhancing the performance and capabilities of an AI system, which falls under the broader umbrella of model improvement and fine-tuning.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: Participating in AI model fine-tuning sessions is a direct indication of working with and adjusting AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing new AI tools and methodologies are core activities related to developing and evaluating AI models.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: Integrating AI capabilities into customer support systems is a software development task, focusing on the application and deployment of AI within a product.

job_tasks.phrase: Analyze complex tickets escalated by AI systems
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing data from AI systems (tickets) is a form of data processing and understanding, which is a foundational aspect of data engineering.

soft_skills.phrase: Ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)
if you are not adept at unblocking yourself, you will likely struggle in this role
Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies

classification.rationale: The job description emphasizes improving and fine-tuning AI systems, integrating AI capabilities into customer support, and prototyping new AI methodologies. While not explicitly mentioning LLMs or RAG, the focus on improving AI systems through fine-tuning and integrating AI capabilities aligns with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer.
